mapper.select: select rnum, bnum, unum, id, nickname, content, DATE_FORMAT(createdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as createdate, isdelete from bbsreply where bnum = #{bnum} and isdelete = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into bbsreply(bnum, unum, id, nickname, content) values(#{bnum}, #{unum}, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{content})
